plugin.pylance_analyzer.title: Pylance Analyzer
plugin.pylance_analyzer.subtitle: Static type checking powered by Pyright
pylance_subtitle: Static type checking powered by Pyright, the engine behind VS Code's Pylance extension.
pylance_help_intro: This page displays static type analysis results from Pyright, the same engine that powers the Pylance extension in VS Code.
pylance_help_what_1: ðŸ”´ Type errors: incompatible types, missing attributes, wrong arguments
pylance_help_what_2: ðŸŸ¡ Warnings: unused imports, unreachable code, deprecated usage
pylance_help_what_3: ðŸ”µ Info: suggestions for better type annotations
pylance_help_how_1: Run a Scan from the top bar â€“ Pyright analysis runs automatically
pylance_help_how_2: Review the summary stats and file list below
pylance_help_how_3: Click View on any file to see detailed diagnostics
pylance_help_how_4: Use Export to copy results for AI coding assistants
pylance_help_export_desc: The Export button copies a formatted summary to your clipboard, ready to paste into ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot, or any AI coding assistant.
pylance_help_requirements_desc: Pyright must be installed: pip install pyright
pylance_no_data_desc: Run a Scan to see type analysis results.
pylance_not_available_desc: Install Pyright with: pip install pyright
pylance_export_modal_desc: Copy this text and paste it into your AI coding assistant:
